11.13.18  10:38 pm   why is ur hat bent

11.13.18  10:22 pm   was the way you made the song feel like the song starts 1.5 times faster than it actually is a subconscious way to get us to feel like the song's already slowed down?

     also what in the world would you even parse that intro in? like 5 quarter note triplets, so you might even write it as 5/6, irrationally? come on

11.13.18  10:16 pm   the rhythms in slow down are infectious. at the start, just due to the way you arranged it, it sounds so much like the word 'time' falls on beat 1, buts its actually beat 2, as proven by the 2nd time you come around to that verse. i was so convinced 'time' was beat 1 that i thought you threw in a 7/4 as the first measure of the actual tune. did you intend this mindfuckery
11.13.18  10:14 pm   tennor saxophone or alto?
11.13.18  10:07 pm   do you have plans on making another long video

11.13.18  10:06 pm   I feel Slow Down talks about that feeling of pressure when a deadline is coming. And not even a proper deadline, maybe some deadline you have inside your head, like "i'm good enough, I should be able to finish this by tomorrow". That sort of feeling. You should slow down and take of yourself, stop and think what you really feel and what you really want to do. Is this the case with the song?

     Towards the end I got the feeling of doing something because someone asked. In this case, writing a song about how that special someone is always there for you, in this case the "special someone" is the client, and we could easil interpret the client as the audience who pay to listen to music. Is this how you feel about the music business?

      I apologise for the amount of questions, I just feel you're really authentic but the lack of wanting to explicitly tell what you're feeling is keeping me from really understand where you're coming from.

     But the thing with music is that... that's alright. It's not always about understanding. Sometimes you just gotta think and deduct. And that is what I'm doing right now. So it's fun, in a certain way, and I hope you're having fun with this question. I just wish you the best because you've always kept yourself honest and fought throughout the uncomfortableness. Love to you and your loved ones.

11.13.18  10:03 pm   do you first write the song and then come up with a video for it
